LanguageData.ATR_MechChildhoodAncientDroneSoldier.bas: Assembled, by archotechs, seemingly very long ago, with no knowledge of {PAWN_possessive} origin or purpose remaining. {PAWN_pronoun} certainly only seems built for warfare, though. What use could Archotechs have had for {PAWN_objective}?
LanguageData.ATR_MechChildhoodDrone.title: Drone
LanguageData.ATR_MechChildhoodDrone.baseDesc: Drone "childhoods" are as uninteresting as they are often forgotten. Many creators don't bother marking the moment of awakening, and no drone knows its own history.
LanguageData.ATR_MechChildhoodFreshBlank.title: Fresh Blank
LanguageData.ATR_MechChildhoodFreshBlank.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was created to be a perfectly blank slate, ready for its next owner to form its first and only memories with.
LanguageData.ATR_MechAdulthoodAncientDroneSoldier.bas: {PAWN_nameDef} is a drone that has only ever been capable of warfighting. Bugs, mechanoids, rebels, empires, none of it matters. Drones don't care who they fight, and they don't remember who they've killed.
LanguageData.ATR_MechAdulthoodDrone.title: Drone
LanguageData.ATR_MechAdulthoodDrone.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is a drone that continues to serve based on {PAWN_possessive} programming. There's no way of knowing how many times that programming has changed, but the drone does not seem bothered by this.
LanguageData.ATR_MechAdulthoodBlank.title: Adult Blank
LanguageData.ATR_MechAdulthoodBlank.baseDesc: This unit has neither intelligence nor memory. It is entirely devoid of character and utility.
